# sudo hpssacli ctrl all show config detail

   Rebuild Priority: High

   Surface Scan Delay: 3 secs
   Surface Scan Mode: Idle
   Parallel Surface Scan Supported: Yes
   Current Parallel Surface Scan Count: 1
   Max Parallel Surface Scan Count: 16
   Queue Depth: Automatic
   Monitor and Performance Delay: 60  min
   Elevator Sort: Enabled
   Degraded Performance Optimization: Disabled
   Inconsistency Repair Policy: Disabled

   Surface Analysis Inconsistency Notification: Disabled
   Post Prompt Timeout: 15 secs
   Cache Board Present: True
   Cache Status: OK
   Cache Ratio: 10% Read / 90% Write
   Drive Write Cache: Disabled

   Total Cache Memory Available: 3.2 GB

   SSD Caching RAID5 WriteBack Enabled: True

   Cache Backup Power Source: Batteries

   Battery/Capacitor Status: OK
   SATA NCQ Supported: True
   Spare Activation Mode: Activate on physical drive failure (default)
   Controller Temperature (C): 88
   Cache Module Temperature (C): 49
   Number of Ports: 2 External only
   Encryption: Disabled
   Express Local Encryption: False
   Driver Name: hpsa

   Driver Supports HPE SSD Smart Path: True
